column3: Hidden Hearth is searching for someone willing to do a spot of hard labor.
Deliver the Thavnairian limestone to Bent Frond.
Scatter the Thavnairian limestone at the designated location.
Would you be up for doing some heavy lifting on my behalf? One of the wheels came clean off my cart the other day.
You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread.
You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread. Ask her about getting compensated for your work.
Got business with me, have you?
Ah, thank you. I had been wondering when Sister would get these to me.
I know you must be tired, but would you mind scattering these limestones around the fields here? I'll pay you extra for the work, of course.
Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.
You have delivered the limestone to my sister? Fantastic. Make sure she doesn't forget to reward you for your work.
Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.
Fine work. Here is your reward as promised.
Gyr Abania is not blessed with the most fertile of fields. Nothing would grow if we didn't spread fertilizer around from time to time like this.
Likewise, our village wouldn't exist if it were not for the quarry, but we cannot expect it to provide for us any longer.
